description:
The National Domestic Violence Hotline provides information and referral for victims of domestic violence and those who assist victims of domestic violence. Also provides crisis intervention. Provides resource materials on request. Advocates staff the Hotline along with volunteers, many of whom are bilingual. The Hotline features access to translation in 140 languages. Operators are hooked up to a computer database loaded with information from across the country.

###MON###
###COL###
name: NATIONAL DOMESTIC VIOLENCE HOTLINE, INC.
